emails.name: Welcome to Odyssey
emails.description: Welcome to Odyssey! We hope you enjoy your stay.

emails.name: What is happening!!!
emails.description: Are you able to log out?! I can't log out! What is happening?! Come meet me in Central Avalonia. I gave the fast travel location to your assistant Athena.

emails.name: Treasure Map Sale
emails.description: Exclusive offer! Purchase a treasure map this week and discover hidden riches.

emails.name: Mystic Forest Sightings
emails.description: Recent sightings of mystical creatures have been reported in the Mystic Forest. Caution advised.

emails.name: Invitation to the King's Banquet
emails.description: You are cordially invited to attend the grand banquet hosted by King Arthur.

emails.name: Sorry for the Inconvenience
emails.description:
We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently experiencing technical difficulties.

 Due to issues outside of our control, we are unable to provide a secure way for you to log out at them moment. 

 Please stay calm while we work to resolve this issue.
